import React, { Component } from "react"; class SupplierQuotationDetails extends Component { state = { bid: null }; async componentDidMount() { if (!this.props.bidId) return; try { const { data } = await httpService.get( `${config.apiendpoint}/bids/${this.props.bidId}` ); await this.setState({ bid: data.bid }); } catch (error) { toast.error(error.message); return; } } render() { return (
